name: RPG Maker MV: Chat Box
description:
FEATURES

  • Face Window
  • Name Box
  • Message background
  • Text sounds

Diversify your message box for RPG Maker MV today!

To setup text sound, each face must be assigned a text sound. Multiple face indicies can be setup to use the same sound data as long as they occupy the same face file.

Automatically adjusts for no face and no name data.
